ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Singing Steel Boots
ygData.msgSnippet: Items costs vary DRAMATICALLY from server to server.  Unfortunately for me - Xegony players seem to be among the most outrageous pricers. The best place to
ygData.messageBody:
Items costs vary DRAMATICALLY from server to server. Unfortunately for me -
Xegony players seem to be among the most outrageous pricers.

The best place to check prices is www.maximumeq.com This site allows buyers
and sellers to post what they paid for items. As you can see there - with
4 quotes posted - they have sold between 1 - 6k. On Xegony I've seen people
asking 8k (This is a server where people often pay 6k or more for a SSOY).

Personally - I can't see paying 6k for AC21 and summon water...

Slyde

-----Original Message-----
From: Matt [mailto:legba@...]
Sent: Monday, June 19, 2000 8:49 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Singing Steel Boots


I just got 32 yesterday :)

I have full lambent except the boots, and my guild has suggested I
dont bother my lambent boots and go right for Singing Steel. About
how much should I pay for them?
